words.source: H1961 (הָיָה, 'to be/become'), HC/Vqw3ms (conjunctive/Qal-wayyiqtol-3ms); KJV 'And it came to pass', ESV 'One day', NASB 'Now it came about' — narrative marker
H3117 (יוֹם, 'day'), HRd/Ncmpa (preposition-with-article/noun-common-masculine-plural-absolute); KJV 'in those days', ESV 'in those days', NASB 'in those days' — all agree
H1992 (הֵם, 'they/those'), HTd/Pp3mp (article/pronoun-personal-3mp used as demonstrative); KJV 'those', ESV 'those', NASB 'those' — all agree
H1431 (גָּדַל, 'to grow/become great'), HC/Vqw3ms (conjunctive/Qal-wayyiqtol-3ms); KJV 'when Moses was grown', ESV 'when Moses had grown up', NASB 'after Moses had grown up' — all agree

H413 (אֶל, 'to/unto'), HR (preposition); KJV 'unto', ESV 'to', NASB 'to' — all agree
H251 (אָח, 'brother'), HNcmpc/Sp3ms (noun-common-masculine-plural-construct/suffix-3ms); KJV 'his brethren', ESV 'his people', NASB 'his brethren' — KJV/NASB 'brethren', ESV paraphrases

H7200 (רָאָה, 'to see'), HC/Vqw3ms (conjunctive/Qal-wayyiqtol-3ms); KJV 'he spied', ESV 'He saw', NASB 'he saw' — all agree
